title: We have to start somewhere
creator_credit: Eric Fullilove, Peter Richman and Banks Noel Paton
brief_description: This film is about development. A discussion group covers, among other things, migrants, First Nations peoples and the relationships between rich and poor nations and the consequences of preaching Christianity without due reverence for other cultures. The film stresses the need for commitment to action
